item.description:
We will have our September Meet-up at Susty's Cafe.

A delectable organic vegan restaurant located in the heart of Northwood,NH, on Route 4 near the intersection with US Route 202. The mother daughter team of Susty's serves delicious vegan food, often sourced from their own gardens and other local organic farmers. From Shepherd's pie to lasagna to homemade veggie burgers, Susty's is a food lover's dream. Daily specials and homemade soups and desserts round out the great fare.

The web site: http://sustysnorthwoo...

Their current hours: Sunday, Monday, Wednesday & Thursday: 11-8 pm, Fri & sat: 11-9 pm. Closed Tuesdays.

Our vegan meet-up group wish to declare the month of September as "Support Susty's" and this will include having our Meetup there. We will ask everyone who can't attend the Meet-up to please visit Sustys at least once throughout the month of September.

We welcome all like-minded and open-minded members and friends who are vegan, vegetarian, and omnivores. You do not need to be a vegan or vegetarian to attend this event, meat-eaters are welcome.

Susty's allows the drinking of alcoholic beverages on premise but no alcoholic beverages are sold there, so feel free to BYOB--bring your own booze.

Please note: It is okay to arrive late, we will be there until 4:30 pm and perhaps later.

We look forward to seeing you-all there and having fun.

Steve and Linda
item.name: September 11, Manchester Area Vegan / Animal Rights Meet-up
